name: Stick Man Unchained
description:
How to play :

KeyBoard : 

ActionControllerKeyboard
MoveLeft Stick
ArrowsJumpASpaceQuick Attack
XCHeavy Attack
YXFire Attack
BV

----------------------

Game realized in 60 hours for the Video Games LAB of 2021.

This versus game allows you to compete 1 versus 1 in an arena that crumbles as the fight intensifies. The only way for you to win is to expel your opponent from the arena.

You can play with a controller and a keyboard. But it is easier to play with two controllers.

Link : GitHub
